items.sentence: I don't think anyone has told Tom what to do.
I suspected Tom had never actually done that.
I used to do that, but I don't do it anymore.
I know that things haven't been easy for you.
I need to talk to you about an urgent matter.
I know that this is the beginning of the end.
I couldn't enter because the door was closed.
I have a huge amount of clothes in my closet.
I wish I had the courage to show my feelings.
How many French classes do you have per week?
It's very important for you to do this today.
I don't want Tom to know about our situation.
Do you think Tom would've enjoyed doing that?
I wish my French was as good as your English.
Tom understands French, but his wife doesn't.
I'll feel better once I get something to eat.
Have you already done what I asked you to do?
Why don't we see how fast we can finish this?
My dog barks at every stranger that walks by.
I have absolute confidence in your judgement.
I don't understand how the human brain works.
What kind of clothes do you not like wearing?
I sent Tom to Boston to get something for me.
Tom refused to even listen to my suggestions.
My life hasn't been the same since I met Tom.
What makes you think I'm going to follow Tom?
Do you have any idea where we could find Tom?
Can you think of anyone who doesn't like Tom?
I never even got a chance to ask Tom to help.
I invited Tom to eat dinner with us tomorrow.
I'm the one who told Tom about what Mary did.
Tom's father doesn't allow him to drink wine.
Come on, Tom, you've got to get out of there.
Tom has done a lot more for me than you have.
Tom was dancing by himself on the back porch.
Tom doesn't really like Italian food so much.
None of the other kids want to play with Tom.
I'm never going to have to talk to Tom again.
Tom has spent the past three years in prison.
Tom has been waiting in line for three hours.
Tom has been absent from work for three days.
Tom wanted Mary to cook him something to eat.
I'm sure Tom wouldn't mind if you left early.
Tom picked up the knife and peeled the apple.
Tom asked for my permission to use the phone.
Tom will be back in less than thirty minutes.
Tom's mother told him to go get his hair cut.
It would be better if we didn't speak of Tom.
Apparently, Tom didn't notice anything wrong.
The important thing right now is to find Tom.
